DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness web-based fall prevention program call Free From Falls Online ( FFFO ) people multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Web-Based Fall Prevention Program People With Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: The overarch goal study evaluate effectiveness impact online self-management program preventing fall among people multiple sclerosis ( PwMS ) . To accomplish objective , investigator design web-based fall prevention program call Free From Falls Online ( FFFO ) , base traditionally in-person program develop National Multiple Sclerosis Society . The specific aim study three-fold : ( 1 ) evaluate effectiveness online fall prevention self-education program compare fall frequency participant control ; ( 2 ) evaluate impact FFFO comparing patient report measure physical function , fatigue , self-efficacy , psychosocial illness impact , social participation satisfaction , perception global health participant control ; ( 3 ) determine usability satisfaction FFFO .
DOC.criteria: MS type relapse previous month Selfreported history 2 fall previous 2 month Ability walk least 100 meter intermittent unilateral constant assistance ( Expanded Disability Severity Scale ( EDSS ) step < 6.0 ) Daily access computer willingness respond daily survey Medical condition would preclude reliable participation increase risk injury program
